mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate =NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = 2, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writerName FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE boardId = 2 ORDER BY A.id DESC;
SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writerName FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
